sense.def:
The price of something
je znesek, ki ga moramo plačati, kadar želimo nekaj kupiti.

seg.quote: The price of firewood has risen steeply.
Petrol will continue to drop in price.

sense.def:
The price that one pays for something
je nekaj neprijetnega, kar moramo narediti, da dobimo ali dosežemo nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: This was the price that had to be paid for progress.
This is a small price to pay for freedom.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is priced at a particular amount
, stane določen znesek.

seg.quote: The least expensive will be priced at £7,000.
